transformations.name: subtab_normalization
transformations.logic: Restrict compliance subtab key to known values and fallback to operations

transformations.name: subtab_content_branch
transformations.logic: Choose scaffold card set by normalized subtab

transformations.name: settings_delegation
transformations.logic: Operations tab delegates editable controls to settings profile workflow

outputs.name: subtab_navigation_state
outputs.consumer: planner subnav and settings surface state
